label: social_support
src_text: Thank you for your concern but my mother's godmother is a lesbian, and extremely close to my grandmother.
augmented_text: Thank you for being considerate, but our family has a strong bond with our queer neighbor, who's been like a sibling to me.

label: social_support
src_text: Much appreciated, and your responses allay our concern.
augmented_text: Grateful for your assistance, it definitely puts our minds at ease.

label: social_support
src_text: I just want to offer my sympathy and to let you know you are a great partner to her.
augmented_text: Just wanted to let you know that you've been a fantastic support system to her, and I'm here for you as well during this time.

label: social_support
src_text: Thank you giving me a place to share my love for these wonderful souls.
augmented_text: I’m thankful this group has given me the chance to connect with others who cherish these amazing souls as much as I do.

label: social_support
src_text: Sending you all my positive thoughts and love, hope this is it for both of us!
augmented_text: Keep your head up, and remember that you have a friend in me who's rooting for you. Wishing the best for us!

label: social_support
src_text: I'm also glad that we have you in our community.
augmented_text: Your involvement in our community is truly valued.

label: social_support
src_text: Congratulations and thanks for sharing your story and giving me hope that our relationship can work.
augmented_text: Thank you for offering hope and motivation through sharing your heartwarming story. This really helps my outlook on my relationship.

label: social_support
src_text: I hope you have the best luck figuring it out ♡
augmented_text: You've got this! We're all rooting for you! 🌟

label: social_support
src_text: Much appreciated, and your responses allay our concern.
augmented_text: Thanks for always being there when needed, your support truly eases our doubts.

label: social_support
src_text: I've been trying to reconnect with my father's heritage, so I greatly appreciate your patience and cooperation.
augmented_text: I genuinely appreciate how you've been there for me while I learn more about my dad's ancestry; your generosity and understanding have been invaluable.

label: social_support
src_text: I personally agree with your statement that we determine our rights and are in control of our destiny.
augmented_text: You hit the nail on the head; we really do create our destinies and define our own rights.

label: social_support
src_text: I think you're better off on your own than with an unsupportive partner anyway.
augmented_text: Honestly, you deserve someone who truly supports you, rather than staying with someone who doesn't.

label: social_support
src_text: My heart breaks for you.. please know we're sending you both love and good vibes.
augmented_text: We're here for you and sending you all the warmth, love, and support you need right now. 💖

label: social_support
src_text: It's not my fault that you have such low standards.
augmented_text: Through thick and thin, we're all in this together – no matter what our individual standards are.

label: social_support
src_text: And for people like me an you, our voice and words are our most effective tools.
augmented_text: As individuals like us, we rely on our voice and language to make a difference.
